I agree that any recordings I make using the Mountain Ghosts app will become a part of the Mountain Ghosts exhibit and can be used by Halsey Burgund for any related purpose. 

 
Thanks and enjoy!

Welcome to Mountain Ghosts! 
You have version 1.0.3 
 
This app is your portal into the participatory audio world of the 'Mountain Ghosts' sound art installation by Halsey Burgund. This project is commissioned by VAPA and is accessible anywhere on the Colorado Springs campus. 
Please listen, add your own ghosts, and explore the campus and surrounding areas. 
 
Special thanks to: 
Rob Knapen - Android app development 
Mike MacHenry and Ben McAllister - server development 
Joe Zobkiw - iPhone app development 
Benjamin Dauer - additional graphics 
 
http://halseyburgund.com/work/mg
